sections.heading: Cooperative; use of term restricted
sections.text: No association, corporation, or organization shall use the term cooperative as a part of its name unless it is in fact operating on a cooperative basis.SourceLaws 1925, c. 80, ยง 12, p. 253;C.S.1929, ยง 24-1412;R.S.1943, ยง 21-1412.
